card_name: The Sun Rises As It Falls
rules_text:
Incarnate {3}{R}{W} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Create a token that's a copy of up to one target creature you control, except it has haste. Exile the token at the beginning of the next end step. If it's your combat phase, it enters tapped and attacking.
Double strike
Whenever this Revelation attacks, you may cast an unincarnated copy of it. [i](You still pay its costs.)[/i]
